text: Nicholas Simon Lyndhurst (born 20 April 1961) is a British actor. He was born in Gosport, Hampshire. He played roles in television sitcoms Going Straight, Butterflies, Only Fools and Horses, The Two of Us, Goodnight Sweetheart, After You've Gone and Rock & Chips. == Other websites == * Category:Actors from Hampshire Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:1961 births Category:Living people
title: Nicholas Lyndhurst
